welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Illescas, Spain! Known for its rich history and stunning landscapes, we invite you to discover and savor all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The original terminal at Barajas Airport, now mostly used for domestic flights and low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily used for flights within Spain and the Schengen area.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Barajas Airport, with a modern design and state-of-the-art facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4 at Barajas Airport, used for long-haul and non-Schengen flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a user account must be created to access it.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
